p: Serial exhaustive extraction had a higher percentage yield than crude extraction. Crude extraction had a percentage yield of 5.51%, and serial exhaustive extraction had a total percentage yield of 18.81%. The methanol extract had the highest percentage yield, with the hexane extract having the least yield. Three fractions of phytochemicals were isolated from crude ethanolic extract of P. curatellifolia leaves. The fractions' colour, consistency after drying, and percentage yield are shown in Table 1 and Figure 1.
